name: Glube Rolls
description:
Entry for Glube Jam 2023! Thank you to Society of Play for this wonderful opportunity!

Glube's gelatinous friends have gone missing! Explore TWO whole worlds to find them in this 3D, physics based, collect-a-thon, platformer, Glubelike! Game saves your course results and best times.

Controls:

Escape - Pause + Settings

WASD - Roll

Space - Jump

Left Mouse - Hold to Grapple on Indicated objects

Right Mouse - Hold to move toward Grappled object

Tips and Tricks:

While you're grappling, you can use WASD to gain momentum. Holding Right Mouse while also doing that can help you build up even more momentum!

Known Issues:

The Windowed graphics option doesn't work, sorry! Just use Alt + Enter if you must! Game is Fullscreen by default.
